Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory27.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Commandant, we'll have to stay overnight here for our mission. Is that alright?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sure.', 3: '6', 4: 'I could really use a soft, warm bed...', 5: '7'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Then I'll go prepare our camp with Lee and Liv.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "It's been a few days of long travels, hasn't it? I can't provide a mattress, but maybe you can rest more comfortably if you rest your head on my legs...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Commandant was just joking. No need to be too serious about it.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "But it really has gotten colder. Isn't today Christmas Eve?", 4: '2'}
{3: 'As you talk, Liv looks up at the night sky from your empty, quiet campsite, slightly saddened.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'I thought that this Christmas would be the one where everyone can get together, but...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "The situation has gotten more critical after all, and everyone has been sent on their respective mission. We wouldn't have time to celebrate even if we wanted to.", 4: '1'}
{2: "I'm sorry about it as well.", 3: '19', 4: "I'm sure we'll get together next time.", 5: '20'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Our mission continues regardless... I was just lamenting, Commandant. Let's carry on tomorrow.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Commandant is right. If we put in more effort, we'll be able to meet again in the future.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Perhaps we don't have to wait to see what the future holds.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'As he speaks, Lee reveals a crafty smile and a projector in his hand.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "This is the Christmas gift I've prepared for Commandant, Lucia, Liv, and myself.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'A Christmas gift... When did you prepare it?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "About a week ago. None of you said anything, but I've got a feeling that you've all been looking forward to Christmas. Especially you, Commandant.", 4: '2'}
{2: "No, I'm not!", 3: '30', 4: "I've been looking forward to it!", 5: '31'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Sure, if you say so.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Then, at least I know this is worth the effort I spent.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'What is the present?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Neither Lucia nor Liv understands what Lee is saying, and he does not bother explaining either. He just goes ahead and connects his Entropy frame with the satellites.'}
{3: 'And then, he directs the information feed from the satellites to the projector.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Connecting to the satellite!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Wait—did you hear a word I just said?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Kamui and Chrome suddenly appear in the projection. You can see Kamui sticking his face right in front of the monitor, with Chrome trying to drag him away.'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Why are you covering the whole screen?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "I'm just making sure this thing's running. Hey, Gray Raven, can you hear me?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "I told you this isn't a live video call—wait... It's recording already! Kamui, say something!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "You're the captain, Chrome. I really should let you speak first.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "So now you're treating me like a captain?", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Although he looks a little tired, Chrome still promptly strengthens his posture and adjusts his tone before turning to face the camera.'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "I'm Chrome, the leader of Strike Hawk.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "I don't know what mission you are currently performing, nor do I know if it's going well. But if you manage to find the time on Christmas Eve to view this message...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'I suppose that means everything is going according to plan on your end. So is our task here, obviously.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "A lot has happened, but I'm glad that we're still alive, still fighting tenaciously for our dream.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Capt, are you going to be this polite the whole time?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Being respectful is a basic manner, Kamui... How else would you do it?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Seriously? Watch me—', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "Hey there, Gray Raven! Merry Christmas! We can't see each other this time, but I've prepared a great Christmas gift for y'all!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "We should get everyone together when you're back in Babylonia, and we'll do a gift exchange then! Just so you know, I want the newest video game console!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "...Sigh, what else was I expecting? Alright, this device isn't going to run any longer.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "I'll also prepare a present for you, Gray Raven. Let's finish our missions first, and I'll see you in Babylonia.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Liv is looking quite surprised after watching the video message from Strike Hawk.'}
{1: '500', 2: 'Is this pre-recorded?', 3: '74', 4: "It's... everyone.", 5: '77'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Of course. I did say my present is "everyone."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'I sent out a mail before this operation, asking everyone who received it to record a word or two.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Well, let's keep playing.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Of course the commandant would understand what my gift is.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'So, this is Watanabe...'}
{3: 'While everyone is still shocked by the revelation, the next message from Watanabe begins to play.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Not sure what I should say, given that this request came out of nowhere. Merry Christmas, I suppose.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "As you can probably tell, I'm in one of the Forsaken hideouts currently. Because of its geographical location, it's still scorching hot here in December.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "So nothing too festive is happening with us. Although I did just receive this bunch of flowers from some kids, who said it's an early Christmas gift.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Look, here it is... Oh, sorry, I just went off on a tangent there.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Forsaken Member', 3: "Sir, did you start the call without me? I haven't put on your makeup yet!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Dammit, why are you back already? And what's that dress you're holding—I'm not wearing that!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Forsaken Member', 3: 'This is the most formal costume we can prepare!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'You have very questionable taste!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Cough... As you can hear, I need to get my men off my back asap. And my face, apparently.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'So pardon me for ending this call with another "Merry Christmas"!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Merry Christmas—Wait, what are the kids doing here? Don't you dare—", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: '...I wonder what the dress looks like?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'It seems that even the Forsaken get to relax and enjoy themselves around the holiday.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Changyu', 3: 'We should be next.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Next? To what?', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "Seeing how much time we've wasted, we probably aren't the first group to upload our message.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "Now that you've mentioned it, what took you so long? And didn't you say you'd be performing?", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'Not enough time to perform.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: "That's right, so we scraped the performance after we were done preparing.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: '...How dumb are you two?', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: 'Dumb, clever—two sides of the same coin, just like this one...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "Aren't both sides of your coin identical?", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: '...How dare a puny Construct like you—', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'What do you mean by "puny"? I\'m not puny!', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "I think we're running out of time.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: 'Ah! Sigh—', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "Hold on, hold on, I forgot we've been connecting the whole time! Time's almost over!", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: 'Dang it. What should we do?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "Let's just skip to the end. On one, three—two—one—", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia & Pulao & Changyu', 3: 'Merry Christmas!', 4: '1', 5: '2', 6: '3'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "I wasn't expecting the videos I received to be this chaotic. I guess they would've forgotten what the call was for if not for Sophia.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'But they do look happy.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "That's right. And I'm still thinking about the performance Changyu mentioned.", 4: '1'}
{2: "Let's see it next time.", 3: '153'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Like what Commandant said. We can see it next time we're there.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'And then Lee switches to the next message.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Merry Christmas, Gray Raven.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Gray Raven Co—cough, Merry Christmas.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "I don't know when our message will play compared to the others, but I imagine you've heard quite a few greetings and regards already.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "That's why I've prepared for you... a Christmas gift from Karenina.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'What?! Where did you find this, Bianca?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'In your room. You really should keep your door closed and locked.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "It doesn't mean you can just take my stuff!", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Bianca is holding a framed puzzle of the photo you all took together last Christmas.'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Give it back, Bianca!', 4: '2'}
{3: "Despite Karenina's protests, Bianca just stands there, calm and unconcerned, and takes out an envelope from behind the frame."}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "Alongside the puzzle is a letter written by Karenina herself. It might not be a good time to give it to you later, which is why I'm going to read it to you right now.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Bianca, you can't be serious... Argh...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: '...You leave me no choice!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Karenina, why are you pointing your gun at the camera?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Get blown to smithereens!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '2'}
{3: '—', 4: 'Explosion.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Did she just... blow up the camera?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "I hope it didn't cause too much damage.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "It's probably fine with Bianca there... probably.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'And now, our last message.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'The last one already?', 3: '196', 4: 'I miss them already.', 5: '197'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "That's all the messages I've received at this point. I imagine the people who couldn't reply must be occupied somewhere.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'You can go visit them later if you miss them, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Regardless, this is the final one...', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "I've specifically requested Lee to let us be the grand finale!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Are we grand enough for the finale, though?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "Are you kidding? We've got the President, the head of the Tech Department, and the cutest, loveliest assistant Celica here, haven't we?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Celica', 3: "You're going to make me blush with that compliment. By the way, who should start first?", 4: '1'}
{3: "Asimov answers Celica's question voluntarily and walks to the front of the screen."}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "Gray Raven Commandant and its members, you have been providing me with many excellent data. I hope you'll continue to work hard in the future.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{3: 'And then he leaves.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Celica', 3: "He's not coming back...", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: "That's Asimov for you. Now, as the President, I should go next.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: "No, I should go next! If you go first, you're going to say everything we want to say!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'I-is that so...?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: "Hmph. I'm making the call this time.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "Although you aren't here, we have all prepared a Christmas tree for your squad!", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'And everyone has helped decorate it!', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: "That explains all the weird ornaments. It's Gray Raven's Christmas tree, of course.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "There's nothing weird about them!", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "Stop chatting among yourselves. Didn't you say we should face the camera?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: "You're right... I had the staff move the Christmas tree to your office. Remember to check it out when you're back!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "In that case, let's put a nice bow on this message, Celica!", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Ayla & Celica', 3: 'Gray Raven, Merry Christmas!', 4: '1', 5: '3'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '2'}
{2: 'In the end, President Hassen...'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "A little tragic, I agree. But I guess the President isn't someone who would mind.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "What to say... I wasn't expecting you to prepare such a special gift, Lee.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'As a member of this squad, I just wanted to do something for everyone here.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "And just like how Liv has always wanted to celebrate Christmas, it's also something I've always wanted to do.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Is this a dream of yours?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Not really a dream. Just a nice thought.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "I've forgotten the name of the book, but when I was studying, I read a line that goes like this:", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: '"Do not fear, for all spirits converge in the sky, and we... We are all connected."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'I was just trying to continue that idea.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'I sent out the mail, so everyone who had to stay apart could record a message—', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'All their thoughts and wishes would be channeled through the satellites, crossing time and space, and we would meet here today.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "I think... it's a romantic idea.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'I think so too.', 3: '264', 4: 'Thank you, Lee.', 5: '265'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "It seems that Commandant would also enjoy that book. I'll find it for you when we're back.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "...Say that behind my back next time. I'm still not used to it.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'After Lee\'s confession, everyone looks up at the night sky and finds countless stars blinking. You are all looking for the satellites that carry the "spirits."'}
{3: 'And you all point them out, the sparks you believe you have connected.'}
{3: 'You know there is no way to be certain, but you still reach out and look toward that shining light.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStorySnowNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'Snow falls from the sky unexpectedly, covering the whole place. But none of you look away.'}
{3: 'And the Gray Ravens say to you:'}
{1: '1', 2: 'The Gray Ravens', 3: 'Merry Christmas, Commandant.', 4: '1', 5: '2', 6: '3'}
{2: 'Merry Christmas.'}
